issue.title: [Integration] Turbodbc fails to compile in the nightly tests
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7816](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7816). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Failing builds:
- https://circleci.com/gh/ursa-labs/crossbow/8035?utm_campaign=vcs-integration-link&utm_medium=referral&utm_source=github-build-link
- https://circleci.com/gh/ursa-labs/crossbow/8035?utm_campaign=vcs-integration-link&utm_medium=referral&utm_source=github-build-link

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7816?focusedCommentId=17033801) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
Looks like we changed some API in Arrow, did we remove some deprecations? Or was this an accidential API breakage?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7816?focusedCommentId=17065817) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
This has been resolved in the meantime.
